list_definition.definition: a feast or ceremonial dinner at which speeches are often made

list_ex_of_english: She wanted some heads of the local club to participate in this banquet, but nobody accepted.

Frequently, people attended banquets and marches for opposing candidates.

At a banquet, servants are shucking oysters as fast as they can be consumed.
